name: ralph-wiggum-marketer/commands 模块
description: [模块级] ralph-wiggum-marketer 项目的 commands 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/muratcankoylan/ralph-wiggum-marketer

genes.title: commands 模块说明
genes.content:
| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/ralph-init` | Initialize a new content project in current directory |
| `/ralph-marketer` | Start the autonomous copywriter loop |
| `/ralph-status` | Check content pipeline and progress |
| `/ralph-cancel` | Cancel the active loop |
